articles.title: Inter Miami owner eyes Barcelona match for Messi fan tribute - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Inter Miami managing owner Jorge Mas is open to his team playing a game in Barcelona to allow Lionel Messi to bid farewell to his fans.
articles.content:
Inter Miami managing owner Jorge Mas has said he is open to his team playing a game at Barcelona to allow Lionel Messi to bid farewell to his fans.
